description: The ED_LAB_STATUS table contains information about ED patients' "lab" status. One row in this table corresponds to one ED "lab" status change. If a patient's ED "lab" status is changed five times in a single encounter, this table will contain five rows for that encounter.

columns.name: INPATIENT_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the Inpatient Data Store record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to PAT_ENC_HSP.INPATIENT_DATA_ID.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the status associated with this lab. Multiple pieces if information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ED_LAB_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number of the ED lab status for the ED encounter.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Lab Ordered


Lab Drawn


Lab Sent


Lab Received


Lab Reported


Lab Resulted

columns.name: LAB_STATUS_TIME
columns.description: The date and time when the ED lab status was set.

columns.name: LAB_STATUS_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who is associated with this status change. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI). This column is frequently used to link to PAT_ENC_HSP.PAT_ENC_CSN_ID.
